attributes.action: Show the new Bond film No Time to Die on National TV this Christmas
attributes.additional_details: The country has been through a tremendous ordeal this year, there would be no better unifying and moral boosting method than the country coming together in the enjoyment of a national institution such as the new James Bond film
attributes.background: Buy the rights or arrange a deal with the makers of the new unreleased Bond film No Time to Die and show the film on national tv.

rejection.details: Deciding when and how to broadcast the new James Bond film is a matter for the its distributors and indiviudal broadcasters, not the Government or House of Commons.
